Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes i found that TAs have not been very detailed when providing feedback on assignments when compared to AI where you can prompt it to expand or go into more detail on the feedback they give you.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt indifferent to the feedback has given me while teacher feedback feels more personal.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: There weren't many major differences from what i noticed but mostly on how accessible AI when compared to having to submit a feedback request form to TAs.
